price: Rahmata nurraa ta’eef hanga yeroo (muraasaa) akka qanani’aniif (dhiifne) malee (ni dhidhimsina turre).
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wamatāʿan ilā ḥīnin
